parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Intermittent Electrical Faults and Idle Speed Surges
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent electrical faults and idle speed surges can cause the vehicle to accelerate without warning, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The motorcycle stalls or dies while riding
error codes displayed on the dash

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Decelerate and Uncontrolled Acceleration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to decelerate and uncontrolled acceleration can cause the motorcycle to maintain high speeds, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The motorcycle fails to decelerate when the throttle is closed
making it difficult to control the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The clutch and throttle malfunction can cause the motorcycle to stall or die while riding, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The motorcycle stalls or dies when the clutch is engaged
and the throttle fails to respond normally.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS Pump Failure Leading to Total Loss of Rear Brakes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS pump can cause a total loss of rear brakes, leading to a significant safety risk, as it can result in accidents or near-misses, especially in traffic.
symptoms: Sudden and complete loss of rear brakes
pedal going all the way down without engaging
no warning lights or indications of the failure
repeated failures despite brake bleeding and replacement of other parts.
